# Rate 评分

# 基本用法

1
<fox-rate v-model="value"></fox-rate>

# click 选择

2
<fox-rate v-model="value1" tigger="click"></fox-rate>

# 自定义 icon

2
<fox-rate v-model="value1" tigger="click" icon="heart" active-icon="heart-fill"> </fox-rate>

# 只读

2
<fox-rate v-model="value2" disabled></fox-rate>

← Checkbox 复选框 Tag 标签 →
